byline.original: Correspondence of The New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court, for this District, commenced a session here, on the 22d ult., Justice Hoyt presiding. There were 158 cases on the Civil Calendar. Great complaints are made, in relation to the amount of time lost by witnesses, in consequence of all the witnesses being subpoenaed to appear at the commencement of the sitting of the Court.
